Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Unfriended \Un*friend"ed\, a. Wanting friends; not befriended; not countenanced or supported. --Goldsmith. [1913 Webster]
If Richard indeed does come back, it must be alone, unfollowed, unfriended. --Sir W. Scott. [1913 Webster]
